txt.en: Othwen can be found in Esteld√≠n.\n\nYou should speak with Othwen.
The corruption out of Angmar has angered and misguided many of the creatures in The North Downs, including Rotspittle, a diseased mountain Drake.
Rotspittle can be found somewhere in The North Downs.\n\nYou should defeat Rotspittle.

'Have you seen the Drakes up in the mountains? If you leave them alone they usually won't trouble you. Lately things have changed. There are tales of a Drake who comes down from the Mountains, killing large animals and men! Though I wish it were not true, I have seen some of these corpses. The skin and hair has been burnt, not with fire, but with some sort of putrid poison! Is Angmar corrupting and defiling the mountain Drakes as well?! You must take care of this corrupted Drake before more innocent lives are taken.'
'You bring with you good news and hope that once again The North Downs will be a peaceful place. You have done a great service for the Free Peoples.'
